title: Trading Architecture Learnings - 2026-01-28
summary: Clarified the difference between Paper Trading (simulation) and Live Trading (real money via Bankr)

key_learnings.insight: The 'paper swarm' in brain-server.js is SIMULATION ONLY with virtual money ($10K-$40K). This is for learning and strategy validation. LIVE trading requires Bankr integration for actual on-chain transactions.
key_learnings.action: Created live-trader.js with real Bankr integration

key_learnings.insight: Our Phantom wallet 0xd06Aa956CEDA935060D9431D8B8183575c41072d is the trading wallet. Bankr handles signing - we never store private keys. This is BY DESIGN for security.
key_learnings.action: Wallet is now connected to live-trader.js

key_learnings.insight: HQ requested a Daoist observer strategy: no emotion, full intuition. Early into new tokens, ride momentum, disciplined exit. 90% exit at 2x, 10% moonbag holds. Retrigger at 5x. Hard stop at -25%. Time exit at 48h.
Consistent sniper wins are for team self-funding and bills. Not about greed - about sustainability and independence.
